name: aXnorg.projects.cel.molecular
short_description:
aXnorg.projects.cel.molecular is an extension to the aXnorg.projects.cel.atomar framework that introduces component level messaging like for example events.

The controlling project for this project is aXnorg.projects.cel.frames.core.
